mapper.sql: id, finish_rate, finish_rate_tag, operat_rate, operat_rate_tag, income_rate, income_rate_tag, cash_rate, cash_rate_tag, cost_rate, cost_rate_tag, use_capital, un_use_capital, add_date, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from capital
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into capital (id, finish_rate, finish_rate_tag, operat_rate, operat_rate_tag, income_rate, income_rate_tag, cash_rate, cash_rate_tag, cost_rate, cost_rate_tag, use_capital, un_use_capital, add_date, remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{finishRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operatRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incomeRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cashRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unUseCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into capital
id,
finish_rate,
finish_rate_tag,
operat_rate,
operat_rate_tag,
income_rate,
income_rate_tag,
cash_rate,
cash_rate_tag,
cost_rate,
cost_rate_tag,
use_capital,
un_use_capital,
add_date,
remark,

#{finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{finishRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{operatRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update capital
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
finish_rate = #{record.finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
finish_rate_tag = #{record.finishRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
operat_rate = #{record.operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
operat_rate_tag = #{record.operatRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income_rate = #{record.incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income_rate_tag = #{record.incomeRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cash_rate = #{record.cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cash_rate_tag = #{record.cashRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_rate = #{record.costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_rate_tag = #{record.costRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
use_capital = #{record.useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
un_use_capital = #{record.unUseCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
add_date = #{record.addDate,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update capital set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finish_rate = #{record.finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, finish_rate_tag = #{record.finishRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, operat_rate = #{record.operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, operat_rate_tag = #{record.operatRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_rate = #{record.incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_rate_tag = #{record.incomeRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cash_rate = #{record.cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cash_rate_tag = #{record.cashRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_rate = #{record.costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_rate_tag = #{record.costRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, use_capital = #{record.useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, un_use_capital = #{record.unUseCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_date = #{record.addDate,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update capital
finish_rate = #{finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
finish_rate_tag = #{finishRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
operat_rate = #{operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
operat_rate_tag = #{operatRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income_rate = #{incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
income_rate_tag = #{incomeRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cash_rate = #{cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cash_rate_tag = #{cashRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_rate = #{costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_rate_tag = #{costRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
use_capital = #{useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
un_use_capital = #{unUseCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update capital set finish_rate = #{finishRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, finish_rate_tag = #{finishRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, operat_rate = #{operatRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, operat_rate_tag = #{operatRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_rate = #{incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_rate_tag = #{incomeRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cash_rate = #{cashRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cash_rate_tag = #{cashRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_rate = #{costRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_rate_tag = #{costRateTag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, use_capital = #{useCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, un_use_capital = #{unUseCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select finish_rate,operat_rate,income_rate,cash_rate,cost_rate,use_capital, DATE_FORMAT(add_date,#{period}) as remark from capital where DATE_FORMAT(add_date,#{period}) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(add_date,#{period})
select finish_rate,operat_rate,income_rate,cash_rate,cost_rate,use_capital, YEAR(add_date) as remark from capital where YEAR(add_date) >= YEAR(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 YEAR)) GROUP BY YEAR(add_date)

select finish_rate,finish_rate_tag,operat_rate,operat_rate_tag,income_rate,income_rate_Tag, cash_rate,cash_rate_tag,cost_rate,cost_rate_tag,use_capital,un_use_capital, MONTH(add_date) as remark from capital where DATE_FORMAT(add_date,'%Y-%m-01') >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(add_date,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(add_date,'%Y-%m')
